name: Sombra
tagline: Software engineering teams that fit your culture
description:
We are Sombra, and we’ve been building remote engineering teams in Ukraine since 2013. Our clients are a product and service-based companies from the United States, United Kingdom, and Europe. We believe in open communication and thoughtful feedback and aren't afraid to suggest changes if we know how to accomplish a goal better.
 
Sombra specializes in full-cycle software development, staff augmentation, and dedicated engineering teams.  Our technical expertise covers Java, NodeJS, .Net, Python, JavaScript, Angular, ReactJS, etc. 
 
Our services:
Staff augmentation
Dedicated/embedded teams
Custom web development
Mobile development
MVP
Business analysis
Technology expertise:
Java
NodeJS, .Net, Python
Angular, ReactJS
Cordova (PhoneGap), Ionic
SQL/NoSQL DB's
